Plot: French playboy Michel Marnet and American Terry McKay fall in love aboard ship. They arrange to reunite 6 months later, after Michel has had a chance to earn a decent living.
Title: Love Affair
Writer: Delmer Daves (screen play), Donald Ogden Stewart (screen play), Mildred Cram (story), Leo McCarey (story)
Actors: Irene Dunne, Charles Boyer, Maria Ouspenskaya, Lee Bowman
